=========
Changelog
=========

V0.5.0 (19/10/2022)
===================

Initial version.

This module is based on grafanalib.
So a lot of the techniques and ideas were borrowed at `grafanalib <https://github.com/weaveworks/grafanalib>`_

V0.5.1 (12/11/2022)
===================

* refactor plugins

V0.5.2 (14/11/2022)
===================

* backage and test deploy from https://test.pypi.org
